directions.step:
Combine ingredients in a spray bottle; squirt on slugs.
Reader Mary Jo Forbus of Arlington, WA wrote: "A few squirts are all it takes; they die right before your eyes, a very gratifying sight! The mixture is harmless to soil and plants. I keep my spray bottle nearby when gardening and check the garden twice a day, once early in the morning and again late in the evening."
"The In Basket: Letters from Our Readers" in "The Herb Companion." April/May 1993, Vol. 5, No. 4. Pg. 5. Posted by Cathy Harned.
